Title: FireworksLauncher
Description: This is the first iteration for building my fireworks launcher. With presentation layer in WPF, NETMF using GHI Panda II board/G120
HomeWiki:
Project Description

This is a WPF application that synchronize fireworks launch and the music. I use the netmf framework to control the relay with a ghi electronic board.

Next step is

- Create a protocol to communicate with the G120HDR and Panda II netmef board

Libraries used in my project

I'm using NAUDIO project http://naudio.codeplex.com/
and WPF Sound Visualization Library http://wpfsvl.codeplex.com/
